definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: I tried to say the lord's prayer.
I tried to say the Lord's Prayer. My throat was too tight for words to come.
sentences.chinese: 我試圖背誦主禱文，但喉嚨發緊，說不出話來。

sentences.english: In addition, the students were to recite the Lord's Prayer in unison.
sentences.chinese: 另外，學生被要求齊聲背誦主禱文。

sentences.english: Recite the Lord's Prayer - in Russian, Inspector Hornberg ordered.
sentences.chinese: “背誦主禱文，要用俄語，”霍恩伯格督學命令道。

sentences.english: Our Lord Jesus taught this prayer as a model to show His disciples how to pray.
sentences.chinese: 我們主耶穌將主禱文作爲向門徒顯示如何禱告的示範。

sentences.english: My throat was too tight for words to come.
sentences.chinese: 我試圖背誦主禱文，但喉嚨發緊，說不出話來。

sentences.english: Neck They use dead grass to fasten a knot, swallow prayers in-between their teeth.
sentences.chinese: 頸部他們用墓草打着領結，把齒縫間的主禱文嚼爛。

sentences.english: Manya recited the prayer in a low voice, careful not to show her feelings.
sentences.chinese: 瑪妮雅低聲背誦了主禱文，謹慎地不流露自己的感情。
